TEXT.English: Extra production from specialists; extra food from Workshops and Watermills; extra commerce from Mines and Watermills; double production speed for Factories and Coal Plants
Double available slots for artists, scientists and engineers; extra research from specialists
Extra experience for air units; extra yield from trade routes with defensive pact partners; trade routes yield production; extra war weariness
Reduced unhappiness from corporations; extra commerce from excess happiness; extra commerce from Windmills, Nature Preserves and Marine Preserves; can spend gold to finish building production
Extra food from specialists; reduced food from farms, plantations, cottages, hamlets, villages and towns; can spend gold to finish unit production

No state religion; increased science in all cities; extra happiness from non-state religions; double production speed for Hospitals, Universities, Laboratories; can build wonders that require a state religion
Can capture Workers; extra production from Quarries; extra commerce from Mines and Plantations
Double available slots for priests; cities with state religion give extra experience; no spread of non-state religions
Faster military unit production; no war weariness; extra production from unhappy population
Additional units without upkeep; extra production from Farms; extra happiness from Castles
Extra commerce from tiles without improvement; extra commerce from camps and pastures; double production speed for palace
No maintenance costs from number of cities; extra espionage from specialists
Double available slots for statesmen; increased great people birth rate
Extra happiness in largest cities; double production speed for Aqueduct, Forge, Library, Market and Jail
Extra experience for units within borders; extra food from Paddy Fields; extra commerce from Windmills and Watermills
Increased production and gold in capital
Increased great general birth rate; extra production from Workshops and Lumbermills; extra happiness from News Press and Broadcasting Tower
Extra free specialist in all cities
Reduced worker cost; extra production from Pastures; extra commerce from Farms and Orchards
Increased growth rate for Cottages, Hamlets and Villages; extra commerce from Villages and Towns
Increased food in capital; reduced commerce from trade routes; increased production speed for Granaries
Extra trade route in all cities; extra happiness from Oasis
Increased commerce in capital; extra commerce from Workshops, Plantations and Slave Plantations; double production speed for Customs House
Double available slots for merchants; increased commerce from trade routes; increased commerce from corporations
Increased wonder production speed; extra unhappiness from state religion; extra happiness from Pagan Temples
Increased building production in cities with state religion
Increased great people birth rate in cities with state religion
Extra happiness from non-state religions; increased culture in capital; can train missionaries without monasteries
Extra experience for land units; reduced growth rate for Cottages, Hamlets and Villages; extra gold on city conquest
Extra commerce in capital from vassal cities; military units are produced with food; extra commerce from trade routes
Extra free specialist in all cities; no foreign trade routes
Extra commerce in capital from colonies; extra production and commerce for Slave Plantations; extra experience for water units; can capture slaves
Can draft units; extra production from Towns
Can hurry unit production by sacrificing population; extra happiness from Palace and Monument
Faster improvement construction; extra food from Plantations
